titles.title: Expressing support for the designation of the week of March 28 through April 1, 2022, as National Small Business Workplace Solutions Week.
Expressing support for the designation of the week of March 28 through April 1, 2022, as National Small Business Workplace Solutions Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the designation of National Small Business Workplace Solutions Week in recognition of the essential services provided by the workplace solutions industry and its efforts to promote safety and support for our communities.
